articles.description: Bruno Fernandes will be a big miss for Manchester United who will need to rotate a number of players amid injury and suspension vs Sevilla.
articles.content:
Manchester United could field a starting XI of players who are out or potentially unavailable for Thursdays Europa League clash with Sevilla.

articles.title: Sourav Ganguly takes notice of Virat Kohli's actions, retorts with pinpoint response - Republic World
articles.description: After Virat Kohli unfollowed Sourav Ganguly on Instagram, Dada retorts with a pinpoint response. Here's the latest development in the Ganguly-Kohli saga.
articles.content: Sourav Ganguly and Virat Kohli are seemingly at odds with each other. Following a cold on-field moment during the RCB vs DC IPL 2023 game, the batting greats of India have shunned each other on Insta… [+2093 chars]
